text:
I am looking for Sr/Software Engineers and Data Scientists to join our Big Data, Search & Analytics team. Experience with Hadoop, HBase, Cassandra, MapReduce, Hive, Redis, MongoDB and search technologies like ElasticSearch, Solr, or Lucene. 
www.appdynamics.com
Please send resumes to audrey.teoh@appdynamics.com
Phone # 415 442 8401
